bug.author: kermitt2
bug.summary: Issue with coordinates of bounding boxes for some PDF
bug.description:
Coordinates for bounding boxes are incorrect for some PDF, see this PMC example. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2340795/42777225-ac936422-8939-11e8-8da9-3dd4cfd3fe74.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC5181807/pdf/medi-95-e5368.pdf>https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC5181807/pdf/medi-95-e5368.pdf</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: This will be fixed by the latest pdfalto, see <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kermitt2/pdfalto/issues/43>kermitt2/pdfalto#43</denchmark-link>
Thanks <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Aazhar>@Aazhar</denchmark-link> it is working as expected now!
